title: Irrespective of their distance from the aerodrome, even beyond the 20 km
clause_text: Irrespective of their distance from the aerodrome, even beyond the 20 km. limit from the aerodrome reference point, no building, radio masts or similar installation exceeding 150 m. in height shall be erected without prior permission of the Civil Aviation Authorities.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
